<S sid ="19" ssid = "2">Based on the intuition that nouns which co-occur in a list are often semantically related, we extract contexts of the form Noun, Noun,... and/or Noun, e.g. "genomic DNA from rat, mouse and dog".</S>

<S sid ="72" ssid = "28">The local graph in step 1 consists of w, the ni neighbours of w and the n9 neighbours of the neighbours of w. Since in each iteration we only attempt to find the "best" cluster, it suffices to build a relatively small graph in 1.</S>
